skeleton.description: String value indicating a skeleton (see description above), eg. { skeleton: "GyMMMd" }. Skeleton provides a more flexible formatting mechanism than the predefined list full, long, medium, or short represented by date, time, or datetime. Instead, they are an open-ended list of patterns containing only date field information, and in a canonical order.

format.description: Predefined list of formatting (One of the following String values: full, long, medium, or short)

date.description: Date pattern to use. CLDR resource key.

emptyPlaceholder.description: Value use in case of null/undefined value
